entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-06-03
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Add query string to dotnet.js to fix Blazor displaying blank page after framework upgrade #56054
  • Unintended localization for DateTime strings #56053
  • Perf improvement: plainTextEmptyFilter #56051
  • .NET 8 Hybrid App (WPF + Vue.js + AspNetCore) no longer creates wwwroot during publish after upgrading SDK version of esproj file #56050
  • Could not load file or assembly Microsoft.Extensions.Logging.AzureAppServices #56049
  • [NativeAOT] Incorrect source generator types when Minimal API endpoint delegate return type is inferred #56048
  • Reconsider the Platform concept in the new render mode detection API #56047
  • Microsoft.AspNetCore.Authentication make possible to configure options in AuthenticationBuilder by dependencies from IServiceProvider #56044
  • HybridCache can create multiple times the same key on Redis #56043
  • Blazor Should able to add Server/Static component to Child of Client component #56042
  • Add endpoint metadata to disable HTTP metrics #56039
    9.0.0
  • [SignalR - Java Client] Add support for Automatic Reconnection #56033
  • SignalR message delivery to Clients.All stops working and doesn't resume without Application Restart #56032
  • Perf regression: fortunes, fortunes_dapper, json #56030
  • [dotnet-sdk-9.0.100-preview.5.24281.15] Fail to build the app after retargeted to .NET 9.0 with error “System.ArgumentException: An item with the same key has already been added.” #56029
    9.0-preview7
  • Health checks should help facilitate OTEL tracing #56028

Closed

  • Microsoft.AspNetCore.OpenApi generate scheme doc Error when minimalapi endpoint return `ValidationProblem` #55883
    9.0-preview6
  • Exception during HTTP request using Microsoft.AspNetCore.Authentication.OpenIdConnect.OpenIdConnectHandler #55881
    9.0-preview7
  • Perf regression: ApiCrudDeleteProduct #56031
  • Perf improvement: connectionclose #56024
  • Config Section Binding to Records that contains a Collection with Primary Constructors results in Duplicated Collection #56046
  • .NET8 QuickGrid Pagination not working #56041
  • Adding WebAssembly to Blazor Web App template fails: dotnet.js not found #56013
  • Perf improvement: ApiCrudDeleteProduct #56026
  • Perf improvement: fortunes, fortunes_ef #56011
  • Perf regression: plaintext, plaintext, plaintext #56016
  • Incorrect Serialization of long (Int64) Values in ASP.NET Core Web API #55571
  • miniwebapi Failed to read parameter "Parameters para" from the request body as JSON #55848
  • Binding is not working in VS2022 #55869

PullRequests

Created

  • bump #56052
    area-dataprotection, area-infrastructure, area-mvc, area-commandlinetools, area-signalr, area-identity, area-blazor, area-grpc, area-hosting, area-networking
  • [Blazor] Consume fingerprinted assets in MVC and Blazor #56045
    area-blazor
  • Add disable HTTP metrics endpoint metadata #56036
    area-hosting
  • Update .NET SDK to 9.0.100-preview.6.24302.3 #56034
    area-infrastructure, Type: Dependency Update :arrow_up_small:

Merged

  • Add test coverage for generic types #55940
    area-mvc, feature-openapi, area-minimal, 9.0-preview6
  • Bump update-dotnet-sdk action #56010
    area-infrastructure, community-contribution, 9.0-preview6

Updated

  • Add analyzer to install OpenAPI package from extension methods #55963
    area-mvc, feature-openapi, area-minimal
  • Initial implementation of PAR in OIDC Handler #55069
    community-contribution, area-security
  • Fixes #55987 , input date does not work properly on interactive serve… #55990
    area-blazor, community-contribution
  • Experimental revert of P/Invoke layer #55519
    feature-httpsys, area-networking
  • Allow HTTP2 encoder to split headers across frames #55322
    community-contribution, pending-ci-rerun, area-networking
  • Ensure that the hub client proxy generator correctly processes both explicit and inferred generic type arguments #55862
    area-signalr, community-contribution
  • Use constant values for CorsPolicy.cs and CorsPolicyBuilder.cs #54247
    community-contribution, pending-ci-rerun, area-middleware
  • QuickGrid: Add EventCallback<TGridItem> for clicking on a row. #55851
    area-blazor, community-contribution, pending-ci-rerun
  • Use JSON source generator in WebApplicationFactory #55595
    area-mvc, community-contribution, 9.0-preview6
